title: Smiley as Foreshadowing for SMILE Fruits
theory: Some fans theorized that Smiley's name and Caesar's experiments with artificial Devil Fruits in Punk Hazard foreshadowed the introduction of SMILE artificial Devil Fruits later used by Kaido and Doflamingo. The connection between Caesar's gas experiments and later artificial fruit development suggests Oda was planting seeds for future arcs.
author: Various One Piece Community Members
spoilerDescription: Theory connects Punk Hazard events to later Dressrosa and Wano arcs

title: Caesar's Experimentation Methods Mirror Vegapunk's Ethics
theory: Fans have theorized that Caesar's unethical experiments with Smiley and the kidnapped children serve as a dark mirror to Vegapunk's scientific approach, highlighting the difference between science used for progress versus science used for weapons. This thematic contrast becomes increasingly important as more is revealed about Vegapunk.
author: One Piece Analysis Community
spoilerDescription: Theory discusses themes that continue into Egghead arc

title: Smiley's Devil Fruit Animation Connects to Ancient Weapons
theory: Some theorists suggested that Caesar's ability to give a Devil Fruit to poison gas (an inanimate substance) using Vegapunk's technique might be connected to how ancient weapons were created or how objects can 'eat' Devil Fruits. This could have implications for understanding weapons like Pluton.
author: One Piece Theorists
spoilerDescription: Speculates about ancient weapons and Devil Fruit mechanics
